phrases: So that happened, huh?
To think that that is how I would reunite with Kazuhiko.
It seems a lot of different feelings were colliding in and around this town.
What are Minori and the others doing?
They are safe, I suppose, but...
In the end, I could not make him understand.
I could not save the town.
I was not really useful...
The Skylarks Take Flight
The Skylarks Take Flight.
This will take us to Ikoma, right?
Yeah.
Then you are leaving?
I do have someplace I am trying to reach.
But I do not know where I will ultimately end up.
Oh, right.
I would like you to give this to...
your brother, I suppose.
To Shiroe?
Yeah.
Um...
No, all right.
Okay, off I go.
It is such nice weather, you know.
A little too nice...
Thank you.
Would you call me big sister one more time?
Goodbye, big sister!
I love the sound of that!
Sis...
Sister Roe 2...
Goodbye, big sister.
Let us meet again someday, big sister.
Yeah.
Let us meet again, my little brothers and sisters!
She is gone.
I will be on my way, as well.
I wish I could stay, but...
Someone is come to meet me at Sanaru, just up the road.
It was fun meeting you all.
I hope we can meet again somewhere, someday.
Yes.
We feel the same way.
Was it really all right to let her go like that?
What do you mean?
Miss Dariella.
Oh...
It is fine.
Okay.
You know, Dariella...
Her nails were all chewed up.
Like she would bitten them because she was suffering.
Is that so?
You were always watching her, were not you?
And I am sure it is because you are who you are that you were able
to notice her pain.
Do you ever bite your nails, Tohya?
Hmm...
No, now that I think of it.
Not since I came here.
I am glad to hear it.
What, Rudy?
If you want to say something, say it.
Well, Tohya, if something is bothering you,
just come talk to me, Rundel Haus Code.
Talk to you?
About what?
About romance.
No, if I were going to ask someone about that, it would not be you!
What?!
We were worried.
Can we just leave them like this?
Maybe we could stay a little longer and help with the cleanup.
No, we have the wyvern skins, and we can get the rest in Akihabara.
We have accomplished our goal, so we should not stay here too long.
But just leaving does not feel right...
Do not worry.
This is an important stop on the Red Road.
It will be back up in no time.
Well, now that you mention it,
the people do not seem that upset.
They are used to this stuff.
For better or worse...
But I do not think having more people can hurt.
If we can help a little...
No, it is really okay.
Help will come from the neighboring towns.
And, well...
Sometimes, it is better to not have any outsiders around...
Are you trying to be nice, Rudy?
Like, we should leave the People of the Land's problems to them or something?
Anyway, there is no need to worry!
They will be just fine on their own.
Well, if you say so.
Yeah.
Do not you think it was fate that brought us together?
What?
Does he think he is hitting on us?
Is not he creepy?
Would you please become my beautiful bride?
What burger should we have today?
Or should we have rice balls?
Is that what we are doing for lunch again?
That is right.
We also need to decide where we will get delivery from for dinner.
Well, there is nothing wrong with eating out,
but since Nyanta left, are we really getting enough nutrition?
If my skin gets ruined,
fans all over the galaxy will go crazy and because another Big Bang!
If you have time to talk nonsense, why do not you make something yourself?
That is right.
Akatsuki and I both gave it a try.
A try.
An idol is not allowed to make anything but sweets!
What the heck?
Hey, are you okay?
What is wrong?
Are you sick?
It is nothing.
Jeez, he must have been jealous of the obvious romance between me and Naotsugu.
I have been thinking...
Have not there been a lot more people like that around?
Yeah, you are right.
It reminds me of when we first came to this world.
At first, there was so much confusion,
and then everyone just sat around, unable to do anything.
Wait a second, it is only a coincidence.
Look, there are happy people like that, too!
You are overthinking it.
Really!
You may look like you only think about panties,
but you are actually really delicate, are not you, Naotsugu?
What?
Hey, are you going to ignore that?
She just said pan
Ow...
What is with them?
I am overthinking it, huh?
I hope so.
But if the same sense of apathy is overcoming Akihabara...
It might be worse than last time.
Eat Grass
This world tried to do something to me that I did not want, regardless of my feelings.
So I am going to do what I want to it.
So Londark was talking like that...
There are more and more adventurers who cannot adapt to this world
and are getting angry.
But there are people who cannot adapt to this society.
Are we just going to abandon them?
And adventurers like that are working with People of the Land who want to start wars.
Sometimes, adventurers even encourage them to do so.
A war, huh?
I did not think it would happen.
Not between adventurers, at least.
But if the People of the Land get involved, things change.
War has always been a part of their lives.
Unlike us, who were born in peaceful Japan.
And once one starts, will we be able to continue to stay out of it?
Oh, damn it!
If this were a quest, there would be no problem.
Even if it were a fight, I can handle monsters.
But...
If a war starts between
People of the Land and adventurers, or among adventurers themselves,
what can the current Round Table do?
It hurts not having Crusty here.
I hope something comes of what I asked of Isaac...
Hey!
Make them run faster!
They are pathetic, giving up so easily.
It cannot be helped.
People of the Land do not have that much stamina.
The villain gave me the most boring jo
H-Hey...
Work harder!
Isaac?
Sir Isaac!
Sir Isaac...
But why was Sara kidnapped?
Hatred, I guess.
The unjustified kind.
Hatred?
That Camus guy is no good.
Supposedly, he is a People of the Land merchant.
But he keeps hitting on every girl he sees.
My, he has not hit on me.
Anyway, he came after us, too.
Would you please become my beautiful bride?
He was creepy, so we ran away.
But I guess another girl from our guild rejected him before,
and he is holding a grudge.
There he is!
Is not Sara acting weird?
She looks more like she is been seduced than kidnapped.
No way.
Either way, he is no good!
Kurinon...
Bastard!
What have you done to Sara?!
Would you please become my beautiful...
Heck, no!
Camus/Traveling Merchant
Sara/Maid
Kurinon/Priest, Lv. 91
Genius of Marriage Camaysar/Genius, Lv. 83 Rank/Party
The genius...
Gotcha.
Sara!
It is okay, she is just knocked out.
Fate must have brought us together.
You want to get hit again, huh?!
Would you please become my beautiful bride?
I will...
No way!
Not Kurinon!
Be careful!
It looks like he is using some kind of strange skill!
Souji!
Sou!
I suppose these weirdos
are showing up now because the defensive barrier is gone.
I will not let you deceive these girls!
Would you please become my beautiful bride?
How dare you say that to Sou?!
Oh, my!
You are into that sort of thing?
There is a lot to carry!
In times like these, I wish we had a magic bag...
Well, this is all stuff to make a magic bag.
I think you did great, Tohya.
When you were talking with that knight...
Is it that important
whether you can die or not?
Have you ever died?
Did you ever die in the old world?
You told him exactly how you felt.
But I could not make him understand.
That is not true!
Even if he does not understand yet, he will not forget it!
I think there is meaning in the fact that you were able to say it.
Everyone is so amazing.
Minori, Tohya, Isuzu...
Even Rudy, maybe.
Everyone seems like they are really doing the right thing.
So are you, Serara.
No...
On this journey, I realized that I have a long way to go...
I am glad I understood that, I think.
We are going to have to walk home...
You okay, Miss Isuzu?
There...
I am fine.
It is not as far as I thought.
Shall we ask the people around here if they need any of the stuff we do not?
It might be better than throwing it away...
It is strange.
I thought they would protect us.
But they were useless.
Some heroes...
In the end, they are just adventurers.
They do not care about us.
No, Isuzu!
They are not talking about you!
Yeah.
They are talking about those knights, are not they?
But...
I understand why you wanted to get us out of here as soon as possible.
I think a lot of people's lives were saved because the knights were here.
But there are some people who feel betrayed because they got their hopes up.
Yeah, we are also adventurers.
We might be blamed for that.
I am sorry.
It is not something you need to apologize for.
And I am really glad we came here.
All the things that were bothering me seem so small now.
So I wanted to do something for this town.
I wanted to leave something for them.
You gave them a forty-three..
A new song that never existed in this world.
That song...
It is hope!
Hope!
Thank you, Rudy.
But if it does not remain here, then...
Our journey's over, is not it?
Yeah.
Is something wrong?
A song?
A song?
You are right!
That song!
Those kids...
It is still here.
You made a new song.
And now, that song will become a new hope for those kids.
They are singing Isuzu's song over there, too!
This is as far as we were able to come, but...
Yes, but this song...
It will go farther west.
It will spread out around the whole world!
And it will give everyone the most important thing: hope.
A griffon?
Meow.
Nyanta!
Chief!
Nyanta!
It would been so long since we would seen Akihabara.
And the city and everyone is smiles seemed so bright, so hopeful.
I felt my whole body relaxing.
All the tension just disappeared...
Cheers!
Yes...
We have always been protected here, by these people.
I remembered that again.
Afterward, everyone else and I fell asleep, though we do not remember when.
But I remember Roe 2 appeared in my dreams.
Even in my dream, she was a mystery.
Unknown monsters, the Geniuses, sneak into Akihabara to cause chaos.
Who are they?
The letter from Roe 2 holds the key to that mystery.
There is still something in this world that Shiroe and the others know nothing of.
The People of the Land, the adventurers, and...
Next time: Stranger.
Stranger
I have friends to run with me.
